name: Intel Core Ultra 9 285K
description: Intel flagship Arrow Lake CPU with 24 cores (8P+16E) and 5.7GHz boost. Features neural processing unit for AI acceleration and best-in-class single-threaded performance.

reviews.review_text: Single-thread king. Best for gaming and dev work.
NPU acceleration in dev tools is the future.
Runs hot but performance is undeniable.
